h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 10.1} eva.m ^a^V3.0279^ea^ ^a^M3.0515^ea^ me suta.m -- eka.m ^a^T5.0335^ea^ samaya.m bhagavaa saavatthiya.m viharati jetavane anaathapi.n.dikassa aaraame. atha ^a^P5.0311^ea^ kho aayasmaa aanando yena bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinno kho aayasmaa aanando bhagavanta.m etadavoca -- ``kimatthiyaani, bhante, kusalaani siilaani kimaanisa.msaanii''ti? ``avippa.tisaaratthaani kho, aananda, kusalaani siilaani avippa.tisaaraanisa.msaanii''ti.
[03] ``avippa.tisaaro ^a^V3.0280^ea^ pana, bhante, kimatthiyo kimaanisa.mso''? ``avippa.tisaaro kho, aananda, paamojjattho paamojjaanisa.mso''.
[03] ``paamojja.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya.m kimaanisa.msa.m''? ``paamojja.m kho, aananda, piitattha.m piitaanisa.msa.m''.
[03] ``piiti pana, bhante, kimatthiyaa kimaanisa.msaa''? ``piiti kho, aananda, passaddhatthaa passaddhaanisa.msaa''.
[03] ``passaddhi pana, bhante, kimatthiyaa kimaanisa.msaa''? ``passaddhi kho, aananda, sukhatthaa sukhaanisa.msaa''.
[03] ``sukha.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya.m kimaanisa.msa.m''? ``sukha.m kho, aananda, samaadhattha.m samaadhaanisa.msa.m''.
[03] ``samaadhi ^a^M3.0516^ea^ pana, bhante, kimatthiyo kimaanisa.mso''? ``samaadhi kho, aananda, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanattho yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso'' ^a^T5.0336^ea^.
[03] ``yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m pana, bhante, kimatthiya.m kimaanisa.msa.m''? ``yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m kho, aananda, nibbidattha.m nibbidaanisa.msa.m''.
[03] ``nibbidaa, pana, bhante, kimatthiyaa kimaanisa.msaa''? ``nibbidaa kho, aananda, viraagatthaa viraagaanisa.msaa ^a^P5.0312^ea^''.
[03] ``viraago pana, bhante, kimatthiyo kimaanisa.mso''? ``viraago kho, aananda, vimutti~naa.nadassanattho vimutti~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso.

[01] ``iti kho, aananda, kusalaani siilaani avippa.tisaaratthaani avippa.tisaaraanisa.msaani, avippa.tisaaro ^a^V3.0281^ea^ paamojjattho paamojjaanisa.mso, paamojja.m piitattha.m piitaanisa.msa.m, piiti passaddhatthaa passaddhaanisa.msaa, passaddhi sukhatthaa sukhaanisa.msaa, sukha.m samaadhattha.m samaadhaanisa.msa.m, samaadhi yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanattho yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m nibbidattha.m nibbidaanisa.msa.m, nibbidaa viraagatthaa viraagaanisa.msaa, viraago vimutti~naa.nadassanattho vimutti~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso. iti kho, aananda, kusalaani siilaani anupubbena aggaaya parentii''ti. pa.thama.m.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 10.2} ``siilavato, bhikkhave, siilasampannassa na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `avippa.tisaaro me uppajjatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m siilavato siilasampannassa avippa.tisaaro uppajjati.
[03] ``avippa.tisaarissa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `paamojja.m me uppajjatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m avippa.tisaarissa paamojja.m uppajjati.
[03] ``pamuditassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `piiti me uppajjatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m pamuditassa piiti uppajjati.
[03] ``piitimanassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `kaayo me ^a^T5.0337^ea^ passambhatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m piitimanassa kaayo passambhati.
[03] ``passaddhakaayassa ^a^M3.0517^ea^, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `sukha.m vediyaamii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati.
[03] ``sukhino, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `citta.m me samaadhiyatuu'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati.

[03] ``samaahitassa ^a^V3.0282^ea^, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `yathaabhuuta.m jaanaami passaamii'ti. dhammataa esaa ^a^P5.0313^ea^, bhikkhave, ya.m samaahito yathaabhuuta.m jaanaati passati.
[03] ``yathaabhuuta.m, bhikkhave, jaanato passato na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `nibbindaamii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m yathaabhuuta.m jaana.m passa.m nibbindati.
[03] ``nibbinnassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `virajjaamii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m nibbinno virajjati.
[03] ``virattassa, bhikkhave, na cetanaaya kara.niiya.m -- `vimutti~naa.nadassana.m sacchikaromii'ti. dhammataa esaa, bhikkhave, ya.m viratto vimutti~naa.nadassana.m sacchikaroti.

[03] ``iti kho, bhikkhave, viraago vimutti~naa.nadassanattho vimutti~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso, nibbidaa viraagatthaa viraagaanisa.msaa, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m nibbidattha.m nibbidaanisa.msa.m, samaadhi yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanattho yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanaanisa.mso, sukha.m samaadhattha.m samaadhaanisa.msa.m, passaddhi sukhatthaa sukhaanisa.msaa, piiti passaddhatthaa passaddhaanisa.msaa, paamojja.m piitattha.m piitaanisa.msa.m, avippa.tisaaro paamojjattho paamojjaanisa.mso, kusalaani siilaani avippa.tisaaratthaani avippa.tisaaraanisa.msaani. iti kho, bhikkhave, dhammaa dhamme ^a^T5.0338^ea^ abhisandenti, dhammaa dhamme paripuurenti apaaraa paara.m gamanaayaa''ti. dutiya.m.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ {a0 ni0 5.24; 10.3} ``dussiilassa, bhikkhave, siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro. avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti paamojja.m. paamojje asati paamojjavipannassa hatuupanisaa hoti piiti. piitiyaa asati piitivipannassa hatuupanisaa hoti passaddhi. passaddhiyaa asati ^a^M3.0518^ea^ passaddhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m ^a^P5.0314^ea^ hoti sukha.m. sukhe asati sukhavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti sammaasamaadhi. sammaasamaadhimhi asati sammaasamaadhivipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m. yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane asati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanavipannassa hatuupanisaa ^a^V3.0283^ea^ hoti nibbidaa. nibbidaaya asati nibbidaavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti viraago. viraage asati viraagavipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasavipanno. tassa papa.tikaapi na paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi na paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, dussiilassa siilavipannassa hatuupaniso hoti avippa.tisaaro, avippa.tisaare asati avippa.tisaaravipannassa hatuupanisa.m hoti paamojja.m...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``siilavato, bhikkhave, siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro, avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti paamojja.m, paamojje sati paamojjasampannassa upanisasampannaa hoti piiti, piitiyaa sati piitisampannassa upanisasampannaa hoti passaddhi, passaddhiyaa sati passaddhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti sukha.m, sukhe sati sukhasampannassa upanisasampanno ^a^T5.0339^ea^ hoti sammaasamaadhi, sammaasamaadhimhi sati sammaasamaadhisampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassana.m, yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassane sati yathaabhuuta~naa.nadassanasampannassa upanisasampannaa hoti nibbidaa, nibbidaaya sati nibbidaasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti viraago, viraage sati viraagasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti vimutti~naa.nadassana.m.

[03] ``seyyathaapi, bhikkhave, rukkho saakhaapalaasasampanno. tassa papa.tikaapi paaripuuri.m gacchati, tacopi... pheggupi... saaropi paaripuuri.m gacchati. evameva.m kho, bhikkhave, siilavato siilasampannassa upanisasampanno hoti avippa.tisaaro, avippa.tisaare sati avippa.tisaarasampannassa upanisasampanna.m hoti...pe0... vimutti~naa.nadassana''nti. tatiya.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ ``yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosako paribhaasako ariyuupavaado sabrahmacaariina.m, .thaanameta.m avakaaso ya.m so ekaadasanna.m byasanaana.m a~n~natara.m byasana.m nigaccheyya.

[03] katamesa.m ekaadasanna.m? anadhigata.m naadhigacchati, adhigataa parihaayati, saddhammassa na vodaayanti, saddhammesu vaa adhimaaniko hoti, anabhirato vaa brahmacariya.m carati, a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m ^a^P5.0318^ea^ aapatti.m aapajjati, sikkha.m vaa paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati, gaa.lha.m vaa rogaata"nka.m phusati, ummaada.m vaa paapu.naati cittakkhepa.m vaa, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapajjati -- yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosako paribhaasako ariyuupavaado sabrahmacaariina.m, .thaanameta.m avakaaso ya.m so imesa.m ekaadasanna.m byasanaana.m a~n~natara.m byasana.m nigaccheyya. {( ) etthantare paa.tho sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0 potthakesu na dissati}
[03] ``yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosako paribhaasako ariyuupavaado sabrahmacaariina.m, a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m so ekaadasanna.m byasanaana.m a~n~natara.m byasana.m na nigaccheyya.

[03] katamesa.m ^a^M3.0522^ea^ ekaadasanna.m? anadhigata.m naadhigacchati, adhigataa parihaayati, saddhammassa na vodaayanti, saddhammesu vaa adhimaaniko hoti, anabhirato vaa brahmacariya.m carati, a~n~natara.m vaa sa.mkili.t.tha.m aapatti.m aapajjati, sikkha.m vaa paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati, gaa.lha.m vaa rogaata"nka.m phusati, ummaada.m vaa paapu.naati cittakkhepa.m vaa, sammuu.lho kaala.m karoti, kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m ^a^T5.0343^ea^ niraya.m upapajjati -- yo so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu akkosako paribhaasako ariyuupavaado sabrahmacaariina.m, a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m so imesa.m ekaadasanna.m byasanaana.m a~n~natara.m byasana.m na nigaccheyyaa''ti. cha.t.tha.m.

[03] ``siyaa nu kho, bhante, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii assa, na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii assa, na vaayasmi.m vaayosa~n~nii assa, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na aaki~nca~n~naayatane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii assa, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii assa, yampida.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tatraapi na sa~n~nii assa; sa~n~nii ca pana assaati?

[03] ``siyaa, aananda, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa, na aapasmi.m aaposa~n~nii assa, na tejasmi.m tejosa~n~nii assa, na vaayasmi.m vaayosa~n~nii assa, na aakaasaana~ncaayatane aakaasaana~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatane vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanasa~n~nii assa, na aaki~nca~n~naayatane aaki~nca~n~naayatanasa~n~nii ^a^T5.0344^ea^ assa, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatane nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanasa~n~nii assa, na idhaloke idhalokasa~n~nii assa ^a^M3.0523^ea^, na paraloke paralokasa~n~nii ^a^P5.0319^ea^ assa, yampida.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tatraapi na sa~n~nii assa; sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti.

[03] ``siyaa ^a^M3.0524^ea^ nu kho, aavuso saariputta, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa...pe0... yampida.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tatraapi na sa~n~nii assa, sa~n~nii pana assaati. ``siyaa, aavuso aananda, bhikkhuno tathaaruupo samaadhipa.tilaabho yathaa neva pathaviya.m pathavisa~n~nii assa...pe0... yampida.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tatraapi na sa~n~nii assa, sa~n~nii ca pana assaa''ti.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ eka.m samaya.m bhagavaa naatike viharati gi~njakaavasathe ^a^P5.0323^ea^. atha kho aayasmaa saddho yena ^a^V3.0291^ea^ bhagavaa tenupasa"nkami; upasa"nkamitvaa bhagavanta.m abhivaadetvaa ekamanta.m nisiidi. ekamanta.m nisinna.m kho aayasmanta.m saddha.m bhagavaa etadavoca --

[03] ``aajaaniiyajhaayita.m kho, saddha, jhaaya; maa kha.lu"nkajhaayita.m {aajaaniiyajjhaayita.m kho saddha jhaayatha, maa kha.lu"nkajjhaayita.m (sii0 pii0)}. katha~nca, kha.lu"nkajhaayita.m hoti? assakha.lu"nko hi ^a^T5.0349^ea^, saddha, do.niyaa baddho {bandho (syaa0 ka0)} `yavasa.m yavasa'nti jhaayati. ta.m kissa hetu? na hi, saddha, assakha.lu"nkassa do.niyaa baddhassa eva.m hoti -- `ki.m nu kho ma.m ajja assadammasaarathi kaara.na.m kaaressati, kimassaaha.m {kammassaaha.m (ka0)} pa.tikaromii'ti. so do.niyaa baddho `yavasa.m yavasa'nti jhaayati. evameva.m kho, saddha, idhekacco purisakha.lu"nko ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati kaamaraagaparetena uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. so kaamaraaga.myeva antara.m katvaa jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati avajjhaayati, byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati. so vicikiccha.myeva antara.m katvaa jhaayati pajjhaayati nijjhaayati ^a^P5.0324^ea^ avajjhaayati. so pathavimpi nissaaya jhaayati, aapampi nissaaya jhaayati, tejampi nissaaya jhaayati, vaayampi nissaaya jhaayati, aakaasaana~ncaayatanampi nissaaya jhaayati, vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanampi nissaaya jhaayati, aaki~nca~n~naayatanampi nissaaya jhaayati, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanampi nissaaya jhaayati, idhalokampi nissaaya jhaayati, paralokampi nissaaya jhaayati, yampida.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tampi nissaaya jhaayati. eva.m kho, saddha, purisakha.lu"nkajhaayita.m hoti.

[03] ``katha~nca ^a^M3.0527^ea^, saddha ^a^T5.0350^ea^, aajaaniiyajhaayita.m hoti? bhadro hi, saddha, assaajaaniiyo do.niyaa baddho na `yavasa.m yavasa'nti jhaayati. ta.m kissa hetu? bhadrassa hi, saddha, assaajaaniiyassa do.niyaa baddhassa eva.m hoti -- `ki.m nu kho ma.m ajja assadammasaarathi kaara.na.m kaaressati, kimassaaha.m pa.tikaromii'ti. so do.niyaa baddho na `yavasa.m yavasa'nti jhaayati. bhadro hi, saddha, assaajaaniiyo yathaa i.na.m yathaa bandha.m yathaa jaani.m yathaa kali.m eva.m patodassa ajjhohara.na.m samanupassati. evameva.m kho, saddha, bhadro purisaajaaniiyo ara~n~nagatopi rukkhamuulagatopi su~n~naagaaragatopi na kaamaraagapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na kaamaraagaparetena, uppannassa ca kaamaraagassa ^a^V3.0292^ea^ nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, na byaapaadapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... na thinamiddhapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... na uddhaccakukkuccapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati... na vicikicchaapariyu.t.thitena cetasaa viharati na vicikicchaaparetena, uppannaaya ca vicikicchaaya nissara.na.m yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. so neva pathavi.m nissaaya jhaayati, na aapa.m nissaaya jhaayati, na teja.m nissaaya jhaayati, na vaaya.m nissaaya jhaayati, na aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m nissaaya jhaayati, na vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatana.m nissaaya jhaayati, na aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nissaaya jhaayati, na nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m nissaaya jhaayati, na idhaloka.m ^a^P5.0325^ea^ nissaaya jhaayati, na paraloka.m nissaaya jhaayati, yampida.m di.t.tha.m suta.m muta.m vi~n~naata.m patta.m pariyesita.m anuvicarita.m manasaa, tampi nissaaya na jhaayati; jhaayati ca pana. eva.m ^a^T5.0351^ea^ jhaayi~nca pana, saddha, bhadra.m purisaajaaniiya.m saindaa devaa sabrahmakaa sapajaapatikaa aarakaava namassanti --

[03] ``puna capara.m tva.m, mahaanaama, dhamma.m anussareyyaasi -- `svaakkhaato bhagavataa dhammo sandi.t.thiko akaaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko {opanayiko (sii0 syaa0 ka.m0 pii0)} paccatta.m veditabbo vi~n~nuuhii'ti. yasmi.m, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako dhamma.m anussarati, nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m ^a^P5.0330^ea^ hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti dhamma.m aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m ^a^T5.0357^ea^ vuccati, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto viharati, sabyaapajjaaya pajaaya abyaapajjo viharati, dhammasotasamaapanno dhammaanussati.m bhaaveti.

[03] ``puna capara.m tva.m, mahaanaama, sa"ngha.m anussareyyaasi -- `suppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ujuppa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, ~naayappa.tipanno bhagavato ^a^M3.0532^ea^ saavakasa"ngho, saamiicippa.tipanno bhagavato saavakasa"ngho, yadida.m cattaari purisayugaani a.t.tha purisapuggalaa, esa bhagavato saavakasa"ngho aahuneyyo paahuneyyo dakkhi.neyyo a~njalikara.niiyo anuttara.m pu~n~nakkhetta.m lokassaa'ti. yasmi.m, mahaanaama, samaye ariyasaavako sa"ngha.m anussarati, nevassa tasmi.m samaye raagapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na dosapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti, na mohapariyu.t.thita.m citta.m hoti; ujugatamevassa tasmi.m samaye citta.m hoti sa"ngha.m aarabbha. ujugatacitto kho pana, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako labhati atthaveda.m, labhati dhammaveda.m, labhati dhammuupasa.mhita.m paamojja.m. pamuditassa piiti jaayati, piitimanassa kaayo passambhati, passaddhakaayo sukha.m vediyati, sukhino citta.m samaadhiyati. aya.m vuccati, mahaanaama, ariyasaavako visamagataaya pajaaya samappatto ^a^V3.0298^ea^ viharati, sabyaapajjaaya pajaaya abyaapajjo viharati, dhammasotasamaapanno sa"nghaanussati.m bhaaveti.
